title: Not Letting Me Quit
body: I opened league to play and it won't let me quit the launcher, its stuck on a black screen so I want to quit it but i can't I've tried right clicking the application and quitting but the games to powerful to do so. Please help!!

replies.body: I also get stuck in the client at times.  My screen isn't black, it appears normal and all buttons and menus work, it's only the "X" button to close the client that fails.
You can give your PC a quick reboot to close out the application by force. Let me know if that ended up resolving this for you. ^.^
